result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
10:49 AM Case called - appearances stated. (22TR21 continues to ride along)
Defendant Raymond James Bolstad appeared by phone.  Attorney Steven G. Richards in court for Raymond James Bolstad.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Court advises def. that warrant was authorized yesterday based upon his non appearance, but it was not signed.  (Court will not sign warrant since def. appears today)
Atty. Steiner states still waiting on test results

Court will continue to December status
Jury status hearing scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Jury status hearing on December 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Bail/bond hearing on September 30, 2022 at 10:45 am.

9:26 AM Defendant Raymond James Bolstad not in court.  Attorney Steven G. Richards appeared by video for Raymond James Bolstad.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Attorney Richards is heard on the non appearance of the defendant. 
State is heard and still waiting on lab results. 

Court issues a warrant and defendant to be held for bond.

1:02 PM Defendant Raymond James Bolstad appeared by video, Attorney Steven G. Richards appeared by video for Raymond James Bolstad, Attorney Luke Steiner appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Atty Richards is heard. 

Information was filed.  Atty Richards does not wish to have the information read. Def will stand mute. Clerk will enter a not guilty pleas as to each count.
Jury status hearing scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial on October 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury status hearing on September 29, 2022 at 09:00 am.

2:59 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Raymond James Bolstad appeared by phone, Attorney Steven G. Richards appeared in court for Raymond James Bolstad, Attorney Luke Steiner appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. 

22CF11 and 22TR21 to be heard together.  

1W Sworn - Deputy Tony Berg 
Exam by Atty Steiner
Cross by Atty Richards

DA moves to bind over.  
Atty Richards is heard. 

Court finds probable cause and binds matter over for further proceedings. 

Atty Richards is heard on arraignment, requests to schedule for another day.
Arraignment scheduled for February 28, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Arraignment on February 28, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

2:17 PM Defendant Raymond James Bolstad appeared in court, Attorney Steven G. Richards appeared by video for Raymond James Bolstad, Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
     Court informs Def. of nature of charges and penalty sections of criminal complaint for each of the five counts.  Def. states understanding of charges and possible penalties.  
    Court concludes at 2:24 p.m.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 7, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on February 7, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
